Cincinnati.Coca-Cola Bottling Plant (Cincinnati, Oh:
The Coca-Cola Bottling Plant is a historic manufacturing facility in Cincinnati, Ohio, United States. Constructed in the 1930s in high Streamline Moderne style, it no longer produces beverages, but it has been named a historic site.


== Bottling plant ==
The Coca-Cola Company arranged for the construction of the present building in the Evanston neighborhood during the Great Depression, and construction was performed largely in 1937, although the building was not completed until the following year.
